params.groupSql: select distinct g.dept_id id, g.p_dept_id parentId, g.dept_name name, null description from t_dept g where g.dept_id >= :groupId
params.userSql: select distinct u.id, (select min(dept_id) from t_dept where dept_name = dept) as groupId, u.code loginName, u.code as password, u.name userName, null email, null sex, null birthday, u.code employeeNo, null authMethod, 0 disabled from staff_info u where 1 >= :groupId

params.groupSql: select distinct id, parentId, name, null description, 0 disabled from um_group where parentId = -8 and 999 > :groupId
params.userSql: select distinct u.id, (select id from um_group where domain = u.domain and levelNo = 4) groupId, u.phone loginName, u.phone as password, u.name userName, email, sex, u.phone telephone, u.code employeeNo, null authMethod, case when outdate is not null then 1 else 0 end disabled from staff_info u where domain is not null and u.phone is not null and 999 > :groupId and u.updatetime > date_sub(now(), interval 3 day) or u.createtime > date_sub(now(), interval 3 day)
